overview: Reign Of Light is Samael sixth studio album, featuring in this edition a bonus dvd with videoclips/live material (recorded at Pal√©o Festival, Nyon 2005):  1 - Telepath (Video)  2 - Reign Of Light (Live)  3 - On Earth (Live)  4 - Telepath (Live)  5 - Moongate (Live)
